sent.orig: User fees or other costs to participate in a computer network system vary considerably.
sent.trans: 用户为加入计算机网系统而付的费用或其它费用差别很大。

sent.orig: The degree of secrecy naturally varies considerably.
sent.trans: 保密程度自然差别很大。

sent.orig: All appear to drop considerably to Japan, Hong Kong, United States, Russia and sri lanka exit.
sent.trans: 对日本、香港、美国、俄罗斯和斯里兰卡出口均出现大幅下降。

sent.orig: The present system is considerably more efficient than the old one.
sent.trans: 现在的方法比旧方法有效的多。

sent.orig: The man felt considerably happy and led the goat following man forward.
sent.trans: 青年喜出望外，牵着山羊跟盲人向前走。
